org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.metadata

Class MetadataBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.metadata.MetadataBuilder

  • public class MetadataBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder to assist in production of the metadata This class is used to build up the JSON structure to be returned as the metadata It is not a store of information, rather a set of functional data to process to and from metadata json to the internal data structure
